header.h1: School Closure Extended Through End of Academic Year

span.span: As you may have heard, Governor Baker has closed all Massachusetts public schools until Monday, May 4, 2020. The district will be receiving further guidance this week from the Department of Elementary and Secondary Education that addresses remote teaching and learning. At this time all students should be connected to the necessary Google classroom(s). If you have issues joining classrooms or any concerns, please contact Sarah Shaw (sshaw@avon.k12.ma.us), Butler Elementary School Principal or Dawn Stockwell (dstockwell@apps.avon.k12.ma.us), AMHS Principal. Updates on teaching and learning will be forthcoming.

We continue to provide a daily meal to all Avon Public School students. Meal pick up for both AMHS students and Butler students will be at the Butler Elementary School Monday through Friday from 8:00 am-11:00 am. Please come to the door on the left side of the building. Meals will be “grab and go”. Lunches will be brought outside upon your arrival. There will be no admittance into the building.
Thank you for your support and patience during this time.
